title.rendered: The Permanent Secretary, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa received a delegation of the International Institute of Tropical Agriculture (IITA).

content.rendered:
The Permanent Secretary, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa received a delegation of the International Institute of Tropical Agriculture (IITA) on a courtesy visit today, Tuesday, 8th August, 2023.

On the delegation was the Permanent Secretary, Federal Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development, Dr. Ernest Umakhihe; the new Director General of IITA Dr.Simeon Ehui; and the newly appointed IITA Board Chair, Prof. Roel Merckx, among other officials.
